title: Web Programming Basics Tutorial: Computer-Based Learning for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic HTML/CSS syntax and experience with programming development environments
context.additional_context: Structured around smartphone-based mobile learning, minimizing offline activities.

learning_goals: Learners can implement simple web page structures using basic HTML/CSS/JavaScript syntax.
Learners can apply debugging principles to correct code errors during problem-solving processes.
Learners can exchange project feedback with peer teachers using collaboration tools and version control systems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
